text: Hey Jane, I hope you're doing well. I was wondering if there's anything special that happened with Timmy today at daycare?
Thanks for the update, Jane. Timmy really enjoys the time at Little Steps. Keep up the great work!
Is there anything Timmy needs for the upcoming daycare event? Happy to help out with supplies or planning.
Jane, thank you for the photos from yesterday's activities. Timmy looked so happy!
